BlackBox.name: CLaSH.Prelude.ROM.File.asyncRomFile#
BlackBox.type:
asyncRomFile# :: KnownNat m -- ARG[0]
               => SNat n     -- sz,   ARG[1]
               -> FilePath   -- file, ARG[2]
               -> Int        -- rd,   ARG[3]
               -> BitVector m

BlackBox.name: CLaSH.Prelude.ROM.File.romFile#
BlackBox.type:
romFile# :: KnownNat m      -- ARG[0]
          => SClock clk      -- clk,  ARG[1]
          -> SNat n          -- sz,   ARG[2]
          -> FilePath        -- file, ARG[3]
          -> Signal' clk Int -- rd,   ARG[4]
          -> Signal' clk (BitVector m)
